channel.title: Pain001: Automate ISO 20022-Compliant Payment File Creation
channel.description: Pain001 is a powerful Python library that enables you to create ISO 20022-compliant payment files directly from CSV or SQLite Data Files.

item.title: Pain001: Automate ISO 20022-Compliant Payment File Creation
item.description: Pain001 is a powerful Python library that enables you to create ISO 20022-compliant payment files directly from CSV or SQLite Data Files.
